title: Red Sol MX: Brief starting week
content:
Brief Starting Week

Marzo 26, 2024


Germany.In a Important proletarian internationalism show Volke Dany (serving the people) of Germany have made a series of Translations on the current context of the class struggle in Mexico. This way, theTranslation of a one itemon the water looting recently published by Mural newspaper has been shared together witha reportabout Boicot campaign actions in our country based on another article of the popular and democratic press. Germany's companions analyze:"Are powerful and brute force actions are not only an expression of the crisis serious in which bureaucratic capitalism and the old state are found Mexican, but also reflect the spirit of the electoral boycott. The boycott of The elections denies the legitimation of the old system and gives the response to the a matter of how instead of achieving changes, saying that the popular masses They have to fight under the direction of the revolutionaries with violence revolutionary against the old system to conquer power. No only applies to conditions in Mexico, but it is a strategic issue with validity of each country in the world, no matter if it is an oppressed nation or imperialist".We greet the internationalist solidarity of companions, as well as the struggles developed by the German proletariat of the arm of the revolutionary forces.Long life to internationalism proletarian!


Spanish state.During The month of March a series of attacks against the movement have been presented popular and revolutionary, which considers these events as "War against Social centers ". Within these attacks were Evacted three popular centers only on March 13 and 14. He newspaper serve the peoplereportedthat Another planning planned last Wednesday was avoided by mobilization of mass and a better level of organization and resistance, calling for reinforce surveillance against the next state attempt"[…] this war is part of the crisis and decomposition process of imperialism, and of militarization of states. In this specific case, the offensive against Social centers remains within the logic of the militarization process of the Spanish State. Even more taking into account the maximum importance of the sector of housing in our country, where financial capital is particularly more aggressive than in other sectors of the economy. It is enough to remember that the Financial capital skips all bourgeois legality when required. He best example is that your most reactionary shock troops (companies of dekupation) are pseudo-openly fascist illegal paramilitaries. ”We greet the struggle of the masses in the Spanish State for the right to housing and the Liberation of territories to put them at the service of the people!


Türkiye.Previously talk laterAbout Newroz's week, the Kurdo celebration again year. A multitude of actions were carried out around this, among these they havereportedsome in Ankara in Türkiye; Strasbourg, France; Frankfurt, Germany; among others European countries. In Switzerland they presented an emotional message:"the Kawa forge rebellion against Dehaq is the knowledge of all the chains that enslave. Kawa's forge rebellion against the cruel Dehaq is not only to take the right thing, but also an expression of the historical consciousness that represents the truth. What the spirit of Newroz, which is part of the thousands of years of struggle between the oppressor and oppressed, and its symbol, fire, was fair and correct by of oppressed against oppressors. […] However, today a once more than the unfair and cruel, he cannot get his purposes against him fair. […] It is vital to transform places, streets and all areas in fields of battle against fascism to create stronger organizations. The fascist dictatorship acts armed from head to foot with the apparatus of force. The struggle of the force against force, with weapons against weapons, is essential. Newroz's spirit is the armed organized rebellion of town.Newroz Pîroz Be! Long live Newroz's fire rebellion! "


India.The day Saturday, March 23, 93 years of the murder of three revolutionaries were completed Indians at the hands of the British colonial force. Bhagat Singh, Sukdev and Rajguru They were part of the anti-colonial movement and took inspiration and lessons of The Bolshevik revolution. In itsdeclarationhe Communist Party of India (Maoist) denounces the attempts of the current government of the Indian Popular Party (BJP for its acronym in Hindi) of revindicating the martyrs, explaining that the BJP and the "national voluntary organization" have Colluded state and always acted against fallen companions. The communists call to celebrate the memory of the companions fighting and Resisting. Especially the war against the ongoing people and the Genocidal attacks against indigenous peoples or Adivasi. In the same line of ideas, the forum against corporatization and militarization (facam for its acronyms in English) carried out aAdivasi Adhikar Sabha(Assembly/Adivasi Congress) in Ambedkar Bhawan, Delhi. There were compiled reports, analyzing the context of the counter-insurgent military campaigns of the old state as They have been the "Operation Green Hunt" and the "Samadhan-Prahar Operation." The event has denounced ..."How the imperialist development model and large corporations, which leads to the construction of roads, mines, etc. Through unbridled militarization, it has caused a massive displacement Adivasi peasants of their lands and forests, which eventually leads to The erosion of their culture ". It is certainly a mass event totally important, both for its form and for its content. The masses popular and the Adivasi peoples, under the ideological conduction of the proletariat, continue to develop the tasks of the new revolution Ongoing democracy, emerging the new power in freed territories through popular war.Zindabad tenab! Long live the revolution!



Palestine.greeted the resolutionunderlining the need for a fire high permanent and especially the return of the displaced.Let's keep going feeding class solidarity and proletarian internationalism around To the heroic Palestinian national resistance! Long free Palestine!




Ecuador.The old Ecuadorian State made an attack against the peasant communities of Palo burning and the pampas. Providing services to their imperialist masters and for impose bureaucratic capitalism, the State concessioned 2,200 hectares to the MINERA COMPANY - CANADIENSE LA PLATA S.A. and according to the collective by water and life, in the last World Exploration and Mining Convention, the Ecuadorian government signed at least six commitments with Canada for more than 4.8 billion dollars. This data reaffirms the total subjection of the State Ecuadorian at the service of imperialist interests, reinforcing the condition semi-colonial of the country. According to arelease publishedFor the companions of the Front of Struggles of the town of Ecuador, the Police in coordination with paramilitary mafias He attacked the peasantry on March 19 and 20, arresting around 72 people who accuse of terrorism. Contrary to what the old state, this action has not been able to stop resistance, on the contrary, masses set two vehicles from the imperialist lackeys and injured six Police and military. The FDLP-E analyzes the situation:"Let's open the Eyes, the world is going through several imperialist invasions against peoples oppressed Imperialism wishes to seize our main means of production, land and everything that contains it, stripping of their plots to Our peasants. Then, the town of Palo Quemado-Las Pampas its main contradiction is against imperialism, against semi -feudality and against bureaucratic capitalism, in that order. We can't trust a gram of rice in the institutions of the old state, all are at the service of Imperialism and power groups, nor of the Armed Forces and Police National who point their weapons to the poorest in the country for the benefit of the exploitative. And they will not hesitate to pull the trigger. In contrast, there is the proletariat, poor peasants, democratic intellectuals, the people Aguerrido, who undertake the anti -imperialist struggle for the Pacha Mama. ”All Our solidarity with the fair resistance struggle of the peasant masses From Ecuador! Down with Canadian imperialism, responsible for dispossession and Extractivist looting of our peoples!


Mexico.The early in March 25 there was a new attempt to evict The denunciation camp of artisans and merchants attached to the current of the Red Sol town, which remains in permanent plant. The facts They occurred around 01: 20hrs on the walker of Gurrión, on one side from the temple of Santo Domingo, in Oaxaca, when the Municipal Police arrived dismantling camps and hitting protesters, including women and children. This time, the masses opposed dignified resistance preventing eviction. As reported at the time, the positions of our colleagues wereevicted in last FebruaryThere will be an answer Organized by the people! High to harassment and repression against our colleagues! Down the bourgeois electoral farce! Neri repressor! Not a vote to Neri! No vote, organize and fight!

Popular tickets

Red CP-Sol: Political Declaration of the Assembly GENERAL

“We march in a small group united by a steep and difficult road, heavily caught from the hands. We are surrounded everywhere Enemies, and we have to leave almost always under your fire. We have joined in virtue of a freely adopted decision, precisely to fight against enemies and not falling, giving a stammed, to the neighboring swamp, whose inhabitants we They reproach from the beginning that we have separated into a separate group and the one that we have chosen the path of struggle and not that of conciliation. And of Soon some among us begin to shout: "Let's go to the swamp!" And when they try to embarrass them, they replicate: "What back so behind you are! How do you not be ashamed to refuse the freedom to invite you to follow a Better way! "Ah, yes, gentlemen, free you are not only to invite us, but To go where you will please, even to the swamp; We even consider that Your true position is precisely in it, and we feel willing

October 12: one day of fighting, not partying

This It is a report of our actions for workers and peoples in the frame of the global action by the high to war against the peoples of Mexico and the world. Companions and colleagues. Yesterday, October 12, 531 of the beginning of the invasion of the European monarchies against Our Abya Yala, today known as "America." The lackeys of Imperialism in our lands celebrate this day forgetting the barbarism that the odious Spanish monarchy imposed on the peoples of Anahuac (today called Mexico) and other territories of our America. The "culture" that landowners and the Creole bourgeoisie celebrate in their official acts it is, in Essence, the culture of subordination to colonialists. The masses deep we have no reasons to celebrate this day because it represents the beginning of occupation, dispossession of our territories, genocide and slavery For our native peoples, which since then we live oppressed, h

Report of the fighting day in defense of PEOPLE RIGHTS

To the working class and the workers to the poor peasantry and the original-appressed peoples to the Democratic teaching of section XXII of the SNTE-CNTE to organizations democratic and independent unions on March 4 and 5 we made in The city of Oaxaca the first phase of our fighting day in defense of the rights of the people. This has consisted of contingent mobilization from various regions of the rebel Oaxaca in the city of the Resistance under the slogan: flood the streets and squares with red flags! As we said before, this mobilization has been an answer in the absence of solution to the demands of justice and the repression that loom about the popular movement and the peoples of Oaxaca. In this way, contingents from regions such as the Isthmus of Tehuantepec, the basin, La Costa, the Sierra Sur, Mixteca and the central valleys gathered Fulfilling the method: task trace

Georges Ibrahim Abdallah
